item.title: Sample project with Ember and Flask
item.description: I want to use EmberJS with Flask application. Flask will provide an API. Ember frontend will consume and display data from the Flask backend. Let’s say we want our fronted to display a list of users of the system. We will have a main page and users page in our frontend. On the users page the client will see a list of users that we get from backend. Source code is here: ember_flask_example
